channel.title: I need help, its either portforward or hosting just please check this topic!
channel.description:
Hey i need some help, im not a bad coder but this is my only problem i have trouble hosting a server i changed my firewall settings added a port etc, and i have no ip and all im pretty sure i got everything right but i mean idk if i have to portforwad or if this is portforwarding i dun remember im pretty sure it is im trying to do this i really need help people. reply all the possible problems you can think of please and i can try and fix it, like reply where i might be having trouble if you did at that part too or something.
But idk if this matters i have wireless network but its wierd cause we have 2 comps, one has the router and the direct modem and my computer in my room is wireless and gets connection from the other computer...
:confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: please help me out
